description: V-MODA Vibe II with Microphone Headphone/Headset for iPhone/iPodForged of solid stainless steel alloy and fabric-jacketed cables, the Vibe II noise-isolating headphone/headset features V-MODA?s world-renowned hi-definition sound, detachable sport earhooks, a discrete microphone, and convenient call/music control functions for use with the iPhone/iPod and other music enabled phones featuring a 3.5 mm jack, including the Blackberry Bold, Curve, and Storm.The call/music control feature allows you to easily switch between enjoying your music library and carrying on phone conversations. Premium metal craftsmanship enables a high-definition 3D soundstage allowing you to experience your music as if it were live. And detachable sport earhooks featuring ACTIVE FLEX construction enable essential sport ergonomics to enhance your active lifestyle, making the Vibe II as adaptable as it is attractive.The Vibe II Design--More Durability, More Clarity, More Versatility
title: V-MODA Vibe II In-Ear Noise-Isolating Metal Headphone with Universal One-Button Mic (Chrome/Rouge) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
